Lab.Description: In this Hands-On lab you will learn how to use MVC 4 with Dependency Injection. The Dependency injection design pattern separates the component behavior from the resolution of dependencies without object intervention. In this Hands-On lab you will learn MVC 4 Dependency Injection features, Unity integration, and Dependency Injection in Controllers, Views and Action Filters.
Lab.Title: ASP.NET MVC 4 Dependency Injection
